pages.text: Very often in modded you need to dig up a large amount of the same block variant quickly, like a big ore vein, a part of a building you donâ€™t want, or just clearing up a bunch of stone. Introducing $(#ffa500)$(l)FTB Ultimine$(reset)! A variant of this mod has been a staple in modpacks for a long time, so you might know the features it introduces as $(l)VeinMiner$(reset) or $(l)OreExcavator$(reset).

Its functionality is pretty much the same. $(l)Hold down the $(k:ftbultimine) key to activate it$(reset). You will now see an outline of the area you are selecting: all the blocks of the same type connected to each other in an area will be highlighted. If you break them with the correct tool $(l)all of the blocks highlighted will break simultaneously$(reset), consuming some of your saturation. Try it out, but be careful around your base!
